title: One for all opinions
body:
What do you guys think about ~~all for one~~ one for all?
Can you guys give me some insight about why people hate this game mode?

Thanks.

replies.body:
Tbh, it was fun at first, then just got really repetitive... The biggest reasons people hate it so much is...

1. People choose really lame champs, and you are stuck playing that champ for 20-40mins... 
2. There are just some champs that counter everyone else... (I'm looking at you heim) 
3. There is no skill involved (get a lot of trolls and ragers)
4. Like I said, just gets really repetitive...

There many more reasons, but they are the main few!

you probably mean lame champs like darius and garen who are strong in this mode but to me lame champs are shit ones that cant help me flat out win a game.....and IM stuck playing YOUR lame champ for 20-50 minutes
Umm? What was the point of this? ^

you think darius, donger and garen are lame, but i think champs that dont help to adequately win a game are lame. therefore out of both of us having a differing opinion we can then move onto the next best reason to play a champ. to win. and so darius and garen are ultimately better to play as in that mode since everyone has differing opinions but win or lose, the champs that are strongest are ultimately the best to play

Very rare to actually get a game where all 10 players actually stay past the 5 min mark. pretty much just oce gaming community showing its true colours yet again. Too many trolls and not enough done about them.
Very chill game kinda troll game actually. I found it kind of boring so I didn't play much. Doom bots a lot better. IMO
Aside from the few ragers it's a very chill game mode for me.
